# Changelog

All notable changes to the Open Fresno website will be documented in this file.

## [2.0.0-beta.2](https://github.com/openfresno/openfresno.org/releases/tag/v2.0.0-beta.2) - 2026-01-29

- Finish polishing the components by @ZOrangeBandit (#24).
- Update fiscal sponsor information by @feydan and @maryfnorris (#30, #34).
- Fix most lint issues by @natebass (#32).
- Fix the Playwright GitHub Action by @natebass (#35).

Corresponds with [documentation v1.1.0](https://github.com/openfresno/fe-openfresno.org-doc/releases/tag/v1.1.0).

## [2.0.0-beta.1](https://github.com/openfresno/openfresno.org/releases/tag/2.0.0-beta.1) - 2025-11-06

- Implement all pages to match the [Figma](https://www.figma.com/design/attWQWKwed1XSaaaMuzM5m/Open-Websites) (#21).
- Improve layout components.

Thank you @ZOrangeBandit for the contributions. Corresponds with [documentation v1.0.0](https://github.com/openfresno/fe-openfresno.org-doc/releases/tag/1.0.0).

## [2.0.0-alpha.2](https://github.com/openfresno/openfresno.org/releases/tag/2.0.0-alpha.2) - 2025-11-07

This is the first step of adapting the website from its origin at [Open Sacramento](https://github.com/opensacorg/opensac.org).

- Implement the home page and navbar to match the Figma.
